alert.note: Alert for Camp; Cass; Franklin; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Morris; Rusk; Smith; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Smith, Marion, Cass, Harrison, southern Franklin, northern Rusk, Wood, Upshur, southern Morris, southern Titus, Camp and Gregg Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Atlanta to near Cedar Springs to 6 miles southeast of Emory. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Longview, Marshall, Henderson, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Gladewater, Gilmer, Mineola, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Lindale, Hallsville, Daingerfield, Overton, Jefferson, Linden and Quitman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Cass; Franklin; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Morris; Rusk; Smith; Titus; Upshur; Wood
